text: Aladár Háberl (9 February 1898 - 19 May 1990) was a Hungarian skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1924 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1898 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Hungarian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Hungary Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1924 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: Aladár Háberl
